name: oink
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially in children's books) used in writing to represent the noise that a pig makes

to make the noise that a pig makes: He came up to the fence and oinked a little bit. I think he was oinking because he knew something was wrong.
More examplesFewer examplesI chose a little toy pig that oinked when squeezed.The pig licked my shoes and oinked.Neighbours reported that there was a suspicious pig oinking around the neighbourhood.
